title: well...
content:
Keen4 is shareware, plain and simple. There is nothing stopping you from linking people to a download of Keen4 in a signature on a message board, a signature in an email, and so on.
I don't think you should go quite so far as to put a URL on a t-shirt, but you could put it in your profile on MSN or AIM, or you could just tell people about it when they complain about not having any interesting games to play. :-)
I've told a couple people about Keen, just in the "here's an old game that's free and is good to entertain you for a few hours" kind of way. They were pretty receptive...

title: Re: well...
content:
